Why we?
- We offer services with NO CONTRACT commitment required their customers. Most service providers who offer hosting and cloud services require the customers to sign up for ONE year thus limiting their freedom.
- We offer services which are based on MONTHLY BILLING prepayment. This helps our customers to have enough financial freedom with funds available for their other commercial purposes.
- Our 24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT always ensure that its customers have peace of mind by offering support.
- FREE SETUP, you don't need to pay fees
